cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP address to an invalid format 'invalid.ip' will cause SCTP connection failures and prevent F1 interface establishment.

du.explanation_en: Setting the DMRS Type A position to an invalid value of 99 will cause demodulation reference signal configuration errors and prevent proper downlink reception.
du.explanation_zh: 將 DMRS Type A 位置設定為無效值 99 會導致解調參考信號配置錯誤，並阻止正確的下行鏈路接收。
